name: Brasilvania
description:
Brasilvania is a third Person game where you must defeat 3 creatures from Brazilian mythology. I made the game alone, the music is by the user Allan Pro, all rights reserved to him.

How to play: use WASD to move, left mouse button to attack, SPACE to use rolling and E to have a coffee and recover life. You can recover coffee by collecting coffee bottles from the scene.

If a bug occurs during the battle, press DELETE to reset the level. If you want to return to the home menu, press HOME.
